nodes.text: The Fricasseed Nerf was a YT-1300 light freighter that was used during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

The Nerf was owned by Hedrett Shipping and Investments and used data supplied by the Comet Broom Service, to allow it to travel through safe routes through the Cularin comet cloud, in the Cularin system. However, when the Service provided the crew of the Nerf with inaccurate information, the ship collided with a comet fragment and was left drifting in space. However, the Heroes of Cularin found the Nerf and managed to save it.
The Nerf was captained by the Human Jyn N'oram and her co-pilot was the Twi'lek D'yra Calisse. The Human Vicca Drane and the Duros Josa Kenn also served on the ship.
